title: December 2018 Android Security Bulletin Partner Preview

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In llcp_util_parse_connect of llcp_util.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add or fix numerous bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the default configuration of the location provider, there is the possibility that location data will be sent to the wrong endpoint due to a confused deputy. This could lead to remote information disclosure on a malicious network with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to change the default SUPL_ES value.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In lppTransposer of lpp_tran.cpp there is a possible out of bounds write due to missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the out of bounds write.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In rw_t2t_handle_tlv_detect of rw_t2t_ndef.cc, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege in the NFC kernel with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In V4L2SliceVideoDecodeAccelerator::Dequeue of v4l2_slice_video_decode_accelerator.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read of a function pointer due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the out of bounds read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In l2c_lcc_proc_pdu of l2c_fcr.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In multiple functions of ContentProvider.java, there is a possible permission bypass due to a missing URI validation. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to validate content:// URI’s.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In CAacDecoder_Init of aacdecoder.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to always perform the bounds check regardless of configuration.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In persist_set_key and other functions of cryptfs.cpp, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to an uncaught error. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to change persist_get_max_entries to return 0 on failure.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In trim_device of f2fs_format_utils.c, it is possible that the data partition is not wiped during a factory reset.  This could lead to local information disclosure after factory reset with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to define WITH_BLKDISCARD, so the partition is wiped.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In CAacDecoder_Init of aacdecoder.cpp, there is a possible out-of-bound write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution in the media server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check to the channel index.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ParsePayloadHeader of payload_metadata.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow.  This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add integer overflow and bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In bta_ag_do_disc of bta_ag_sdp.cc, there is a possible out-of-bound read due to an incorrect parameter size. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to use the correct UUID array size.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ihevcd_sao_shift_ctb of ihevcd_sao.c there is a possible out of bounds write due to missing bounds check. This could lead to information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the out of bounds write.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sk_clone_lock of sock.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to type confusion. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to set sk_prot_creator when cloning sockets to the right protocol.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In unflatten of GraphicBuffer.cpp, there is a possible bad fd close due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege in the system server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a boundary check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In llcp_util_parse_cc of llcp_util.cc, there is a possible out-of-bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In llcp_util_parse_link_params of llcp_util.cc, there is a possible out-of-bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In dumpExtractors of IMediaExtractor.cp, there is a possible disclosure of recently accessed media files due to a permissions bypass. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a permission check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ext4_xattr_set_entry of xattr.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege when accessing a malformed ext4 filesystem with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a check for nonzero e_value_size.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In MasteringMetadata::Parse of mkvparser.cc there is a possible double free due to an insecure default value. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the double free.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In readBytes of xltdecwbxml.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. This only affects Android 9.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a check to prevent the integer overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In really_install_package of install.cpp, there is a possible free of arbitrary memory due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to initialize ZipArchive structs before use.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: On Pixel devices there is a bug causing verified boot to show the same certificate fingerprint despite using different signing keys. This may lead to local escalation of privilege if people are relying on those fingerprints to determine what version of the OS the device is running, with System execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the bug and return the correct fingerprint.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In process_service_search_rsp of sdp_discovery.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure when connecting to a malicious Bluetooth device with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In HID_DevAddRecord of hidd_api.cc, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege in the Bluetooth service with User execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds checks and fix the allocation size.
